name: Cobweb Kingdom
description:
How to Play :

Move the Spider with your Mouse, the further the mouse, the Faster He goes

How Space while on a Web (White) to make a web wherever you go!

You move fast on webs, but slow on Ground.

On the Ground, you lose your HP and energy.

You need energy to make webs

the More webs you make, the more energy is used up!

Your Energy can be determined by how fat the Spider is!

Your HP is Displayed on a Bar.

Slowly, you Regen health while on webs but you lose Energy slowly everywhere!!

___________________________________________

Insects:

Eat Insects to Earn Points and Energy

Insects Move Slower in your Webs, but they damage your Webs when stuck in them!

(ProTip: Insects give as much points when eaten as energy!)

Fly : The Basic Insect, Moves Fast, and Gives 10 points

Bee : A Faster Version of The Fly, has a Deadly Stinger, Don't try to eat it from the Back or it'll sting you, Don't let it Bite your Back either! Gives 20 points

DragonFly : A Crazy Variant of the Fly, Moves with no directional Sense and is fast in your webs. Gives 30 points

Mosquito : The Smartest and Most Annoying Insect Around, They are very hard to kill and If they are close and they are pointing towards your back, they can even leech HP from you! Awards 40 points upon Consumption

Butterfly : The Most Stupid Insect (And the Most Beautiful too!) They Fly without Directional Sense, although they are very slow. They give 50 points!

Moth : They award 60 points when eaten. They are basically Butterflies but are scared of the mouse pointer. If your Mouse gets too Close to them, they will run away from it!

___________________________________________

Hope you have Fun Playing this Game

Happy Halloween! #action #rpg #survival #strategy
